Title: KLM ROYAL DUTCH AIRLINES,
Data:
Republic of the Philippines
SUPREME COURT
Manila


SECOND DIVISION


G.R. No. L-52153 & L-52154	November 17, 1980


KLM ROYAL DUTCH AIRLINES, 
petitioner-appellant,

vs.


COURT OF APPEALS, VENANCIO DUARTE and LUZ SILVA-DUARTE, 
respondents-appellees.


G.R. No. L-52154	November 17, 1980


KLM ROYAL DUTCH AIRLINES, 
petitioner-appellant,

vs.


COURT OF APPEALS, MODESTO FLORES and MARIA M. QUILINO FLORES, 
respondents-appellees.
 




AQUINO, 
J.:


On October 16, 1980, the parties, assisted by their lawyers, filed the following:






MOTION FOR COMPROMISE JUDGMENT


COME NOW the private parties, assisted by their respective attorneys, and to this Honorable Court respectfully state that:


1.	They have just reached an amicable settlement of their differences in this case.


2.	The petitioner KLM Royal Dutch Airlines has agreed to pay to the Flores spouses in G. R. No. L-52154 the sum of P425,000.00 and to the Duarte spouses in G.R. No. L-52153 the sum of P353,677.74 broken down as follows:










P350,000.00 

	 3,515.40 (US $465.00) 


 162.34
 (FR 90.00)


P353,677.74










3.	For and in consideration of the foregoing agreement, the parties hereto hereby release and discharge each other from any and all claims arising out of the causes of action sued upon in the above-entitled cases.


WHEREFORE, it is respectfully prayed that judgment be rendered in accordance with the foregoing compromise agreement, without costs. 


	Makati for Manila, Metro Manila, October 9, 1980. 


Assisted by: 			KLM ROYAL DUTCH AIRLINES 

		REYES, SANTAYANA, 		Petitioner 

		TAYAO & PICAZO 	BY. 
(Sgd)
 P.E. 
Heeswyck
 

	By: 				 P. E. van HEESWYCK 			 (SGD.) Rafael S. Santayana 	 General Manager Philippines

	(Typed) RAFAEL S. SANTAYA 

		Counsel for the Petitioner


	3rd Floor, Zaragoza Building, Gamboa cor. Trasierra Street


			Makati, Metro Manila 

			 — jde —


VENANCIO DUARTE, ET AL.,	MODESTO FLORES, ET AL.

		Respondents			Respondents


By (SGD.) (ILLEGIBLE)		By (SGD.) (ILLEGIBLE) 


Assisted By:






FLORES, OCAMPO, DIZON & DOMINGO






By: (SGD.) Emiliano M Ocampo 

	 (Typed) EMILIANO M. OCAMPO 

		Attorneys for the Respondents 

		 Suite 1901. Pacific Bank Bldg. 

	 Ayala Ave., Makati, Metro Manila






The motion is granted. The compromise agreement is approved. Judgment is hereby rendered in accordance therewith. The parties are enjoined to comply with the terms of the said agreement. No. costs.


SO ORDERED.


Barredo (Chairman), Concepcion, Jr., Abad Santos and De Castro, JJ., concur.
